title: Stargate Universe Season 1 1080p Genuine BD Rip HEVC 10 Bit
description:
This is the complete first season of Stargate Universe, here re-encoded as a 10 bit 2 pass high quality 1080p HEVC with smaller files sizes, after some complaints about an earlier torrent with larger files.

The 3 opening episodes were done at an average bitrate of 1500kbps, but the remaining 17 were done at 1200kbps. I used x265 in "slow" or "slower" preset mode, and each was done as a 2 pass encode - that is why it has taken so long!

The audio for each episode is both AC3 at 384 kbps 5.1, and also a stereo AAC track at 128kbps.

Finally, each mkv includes the English subtitles (SRT) in the stream (soft, not hard encoded).

I think that x265.exe has done a good job here, and I cannot tell the difference between the episodes that were encoded as "slow" and those at "slower" other than it required several more hours to encode the latter.

Please share and enjoy
